arts.ttl: Lucas Höler's double delight propels Freiburg to victory over Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Ritsu Dōan celebrates his goal that doubled Freiburg's lead early in the second half. Any hopes of a comeback were quickly extinguished, however, as Höler struck again just two minutes later, restoring Freiburg's two-goal cushion and effectively sealing the victory.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leipzig crisis deepens, Stuttgart draw, Freiburg snap skid
arts.sum: In the most significant result of the latest set of Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs, VfL Wolfsburg dismantled wobbling RB Leipzig with a 5-1 shellacking. VfB Stuttgart (wobbling themselves) could only manage a draw while Freiburg, Leverkusen, and Augsburg all earned wins.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. Gladbach preview: Two closely-matched sides face off
arts.sum: Two sides level on points will go head-to-head when Freiburg play host to Borussia Mönchengladbach on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: With Der Klassiker taking centre stage, there are some terrific matches to follow across Europe this weekend and Liam Flin has scoured the top divisions for a five-team acca covering Saturday and Sunday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Freiburg vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Freiburg and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
After European games for some German clubs in midweek, it is a return to Bundesliga action this weekend with Alex Jack taking us through all nine games.
